snippet: Turning their sights beyond New York, advocates for the legalization of same-sex marriage have enlisted the Rev. Al Sharpton to help promote their cause in other states, particularly among black lawmakers and clergy.
abstract: Turning their sights beyond New York, advocates for the legalization of same-sex marriage have enlisted the Rev. Al Sharpton to help promote their cause in other states, particularly among black lawmakers and clergy.

headline.main: In Video, Sharpton Shows Support for Gay Marriage
